General.Name: Daura Capital Corp
General.Description: Daura Capital Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to identify, evaluate, and acquire assets, properties, or businesses, which would constitute a qualifying transaction. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
